sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react';
import SignUpSchema from '../../Schema/SignUpSchema'
import * as yup from 'yup'
import {
    Container,
    FormWrap,
    Icon,
    FormContent,
    Form,
    FormH1,
    FormLabel,
    FormInput,
    CheckboxLabel,
    Checkbox,
    FormButton,
    Errors
} from './SignUpElements'
const SingUp = () => {
const [disabled,setDisabled]= useState(true)

    const [inputs,setInputs] = useState({
        name:'',
        lastName:'',
        email:"",
        password:"",
        term:false

    })
const change = (event) => {
const {name,value,type,checked} = event.target
 const newValue = type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
setInputs({...inputs,[name]:newValue})
    console.log(name, newValue)
}
    return (
        <>
            <Container>
                <FormWrap>
                    <Icon to={'/'}> People Bank </Icon>
                    <FormContent>
                        <Form>
                            <FormH1>Create Account</FormH1>
                            <FormLabel htmlFor="name" >Name</FormLabel>
                            <FormInput value={inputs.name} onChange={change} type="text" name="name" id={'name'} placeholder="Enter your name" />

                            <FormLabel htmlFor="lastName" >last Name</FormLabel>

                            <FormInput value={inputs.lastName} onChange={change} type="text" name="lastName" id={'lastName'} placeholder="Enter your last name"/>

                            <FormLabel htmlFor="email" >Email</FormLabel>

                            <FormInput value={inputs.email} id="email" onChange={change} type="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter your Email"/>

                            <FormLabel htmlFor="password" >Password</FormLabel>

                            <FormInput value={inputs.password} id="password" onChange={change} type="password" name="password" placeholder={'Enter Password'}/>

                            <CheckboxLabel htmlFor="term">Terms and Conditions </CheckboxLabel>
                            <Checkbox onChange={change} id={'term'} type="checkbox" name="term" checked={inputs.term}/>

                            <FormButton disabled={disabled} onChange={change} type="submit">Continue</FormButton>

                        </Form>
                    </FormContent>
                </FormWrap>
            </Container>
        </>
    )
}

export default SingUp
